name: Financial Planning (Cost Control)
trigger: New Department Request OR Monthly Review

steps.prompt: The estimated cost is {{cost}}. The current monthly budget is {{budget}}. Is this acceptable? If yes, approve. If no, suggest downgrading Security Level.
Review this budget allocation. Does it violate Commandment VIII (Stealing/Waste) or X (Covetousness)? Ensure funds are not used for unethical purposes.
